quote: As part of the full-stack track, I successfully completed the Next Level Web Development course. The program covered a wide range of technologies including TypeScript, Node.js, Express, React, Redux, Next.js, SQL, PostgreSQL, Prisma, MongoDB, and Mongoose. This certification validates my ability to build scalable and dynamic full-stack web applications.
name: Next Level Web Development

quote: I successfully completed the Complete Web Development Course by Programming Hero, where I learned and applied JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Tailwind CSS, and React through hands-on projects. This certification demonstrates my proficiency in front-end development and my ability to build dynamic, responsive, and user-friendly web applications.
name: Complete Web Development

quote: My skills include network security, threat detection, log analysis, incident response, and applying cybersecurity best practices. I stay up to date with the latest cyber threats and continuously improve my knowledge to ensure strong and reliable security solutions.
name: Cyber Security Analyst (C3SA)
